title: O Tuneful Voice - c18 English Songs (Hyperion EO5)[OGG][twistle]
description:
A CD of eighteenth-century English songs and duets.  All easy on the ears!

Track 20 is a favourite of mine: a musically beautiful setting of part of a  masterful poem by Pope (http://www.monadnock.net/poems/eloisa.html).  

OGG ~320K
